translations: vt.对……来说有必要，使……受益（behoove 的过去式和过去分词）
vi.理应，适宜（behoove 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: He spoke courteously, as it behooved.
As long as women were denied the financial and educational opportunities of men, it behooved them to "marry up" -how else would they improve their lot?
sentences.translation: 只要女性受教育的程度低一点，接触金融方面的机会少一些，那么她们就会选择快些把自己嫁掉——她们到底可以如何让自己变得更优秀呢？
